item.title: No wedding and see this crazy to add here!, 27th November
item.description:
Missing drained ones next to Tesco! Has been as follow as sen at HoC; Be polite Use exact locations Say how long the issue’s been present ( if local you can find it easy and if care with degree into this with social policy subject as many more to do this Jos at at top not AsD! As we had debates at uni then at work so never used false information or gossips as per request here and all details from life experiences and books too plus advises as well; Don’t identify or accuse other people Don’t include private contact details in the description STAGNATION and now flower baskets too also do not post repairs regarding some street miles away from that street on the floor but post to local and not on later too!

item.title: Potencial ( correct spelling why in red? ) car park area!, 27th November
item.description:
Block off land for builder by new houses not filled up as area with nothing special and OMG businesses in it with fire hazards and awful windows! Some resting ones should be after lease removed as just date of space with crap and closed ones! Rent for free and here you go! Where we meant to work or rent places for new business which will pay taxes for local communities and small businesses! Chineses done so many of it and then boom we cannot afford this as benefits if we want or not with zero input into it and all for free! Think! Look at size of it and walk during night! Some move so let us as that nice building to managed as I won't go there! Tacky with awful attitude and I don't have one as not your business and you have to many to look after! Results here we go!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leather Place, Old Kent Road, Greater London

item.title: Office rubbish dumped on the street (cardboard boxes), piling for days., 27th November
item.description:
Office rubbish dumped on the street (cardboard boxes), piling for days. Not in any rubbish bags, so will never be collected. This is already the second instance I have had to report it recently; it seems the office is not aware of how to properly dispose of the rubbish.

item.title: Wow, 27th November
item.description:
As in old days fine to all and scan all if pays or not as now this one so well. If not paid more than and n/a inquiry then why and fair decision so on! Old houses either to replace by new and like for like if wanted for local ones only as priority as happens to me and was declined! Budget solution or help with tickets if over 1.30 min as legal only 1hr! Or map with better links! Bins next to balconies is this legal please and who gave permission? Fake courts and Croydon by some and why? cannot add or scan or read pass to boss as not on envelope for you too! More friendly attitude and listen and sent to all what you want to do before not after! Check council estates as so many empty with 0 to pay for taxes and waste as seen 2/3 at some near by area empty and build up as crazy for example by as per map as awful and seen rats and windows almost rotten and to many empty car spots and battle in other places for it! Crimscott Street ( forgot place to clean) and as you see street nit added and in red again then mistakes as correct! Tell me why local one? Some business left as all mess around too! has been for years! Bill up in sick projects opposite council on yards and places to park! We had the in Glasgow so no thanks! Hazel/Curtis Way a nightmare! New roads against people will and grammar mistakes! Pay for ir and get private for this mess and become middle class as you wish!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 61, Willow Walk, Old Kent Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Issue, 27th November
item.description:
You can walk in out with no problem , I mean toilet and interviews by main windows as so many rooms empty! Bins food wastage a good idea but we use brown ones not grey this why most dumped stickers out! Only in our side of house 1-47 PS. se16? Pilot program again? As mentioned boring and not safe so renting ones from City or Canary W. as dirty and tenants left further away. No new residents as many empty buildings and not most prefer not to stay here and some here not welcoming too to many! IT system to be checked as had to use this way as many either do not work or blocked off or later as my applications and no proper staff according to governments acts with %! Many empty communal sites no to new ones as most empty! Waste of public money and 4/5 next to each others? NO! Grown up as it is modern society! get use to it!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 160, Tooley Street, The Borough, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: In front of 145 Granville Road NW6 5AR, 27th November
item.description:
The Lady is Like my Beloved Mum Elderly. These Dog Walkers RELENTLESSLY Make there Dogs FOUL in front of Residents homes on Granville Road. Please CLEAR THIS Dog Mess in front of 145 Granville Road. The Resident is a Wheelchair Lady. They are NOT CLEANING UP after there Dogs. Dogs MESS is DISGUSTING, DIRTY, UNHEALTHY and can CAUSE ILLNESS. Elderly Residents and Children have to walk along Granville Road and ENDURE THIS PROBLEM DAY IN and DAY OUT. There is also a Nursery School and Children and there Parents have to walk along Granville Road. I have REQUESTED STOP FOULING and CLEAN UP AFTER YOUR DOG SiGNS in front of 145, 147 and 149 as this is A DOG WALKERS PARADISE. No one is Listening to me. I have CLEANED MANY A DOG MESS and it’s HORRENDOUS. I CARE about The Road I live and it’s NOT FAIR Elderly Residents have to ENDURE this .

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Granville Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
